title: Business Phone Call

stages.name: Introduction
stages.ai_opening: ABC Company, this is Sarah speaking. How may I help you?
stages.learning_tip: 전화 시 본인 소개 - 'This is [name] from [company]'
suggested_responses: Hello, this is Park from XYZ Company.
Hi, I'm calling about the project proposal.
May I speak with Mr. Johnson, please?

stages.name: Purpose
stages.ai_prompt: Ask about the purpose of the call
stages.learning_tip: 'The reason I'm calling is...'로 용건을 말해요
suggested_responses: The reason I'm calling is to discuss the contract.
I'd like to schedule a meeting.
I'm following up on our previous conversation.

stages.name: Discussion
suggested_responses: Would Thursday at 2pm work for you?
Could you send me the details via email?

key_vocabulary.example: I'm following up on our meeting.

completion_message: Great job completing the Business Phone Call scenario!
